data_deletion.title: User Data Deletion Instructions
data_deletion.subtitle: Learn how to request deletion of your personal data associated with the PoDrodze application.
data_deletion.student_note: This is a student project developed for an academic course. The service is provided for educational purposes.
data_deletion.step_1_desc: Email us with the subject line provided below.
data_deletion.step_2_desc: Provide your PoDrodze email or other identifier so we can locate your account.
data_deletion.step_3_desc: We will confirm completion via email once the request is processed.
data_deletion.footer_note: If you used Facebook Login, your request can reference the same email used for Facebook.
data_deletion.details_subtitle: Select a section to view more information.
data_deletion.section_what_desc: We can delete data associated with your PoDrodze account, including provider identifiers (e.g., Facebook Login) and app content linked to your account.
data_deletion.what_1: Account details (name, email, linked provider identifiers).
data_deletion.what_2: Content created in the app that is linked to your account (e.g., trips, places, votes).
data_deletion.what_3: Technical identifiers needed to handle authentication records, where applicable.
data_deletion.how_lead: Send a request by email using the details below.
data_deletion.include_1: Your email used in PoDrodze (or your Facebook email if you used Facebook Login).
data_deletion.include_2: Your name or username used in the app (if available).
data_deletion.include_3: Any additional details that help us identify the account (optional).
data_deletion.manual_note: Requests are verified to prevent unauthorized deletions. We may ask for additional confirmation if needed.
data_deletion.section_time_desc: We process deletion requests as soon as possible, typically within 30 days, and confirm completion by email.
data_deletion.aside_1: If you signed in via Facebook, you can reference the same email used for Facebook Login.
data_deletion.aside_2: This page exists to meet platform requirements and to inform users how to request data deletion.
data_deletion.aside_3: You may also request deletion of the entire account and related app data.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: This document explains what data we collect, why we collect it, and how you can control it in PoDrodze.
privacy.student_note: This is a student project developed for an academic course. The service is provided for educational purposes.
privacy.quick_1_desc: Account data and app content linked to your account (e.g., trips).
privacy.quick_2_desc: To provide authentication and core features like trip planning.
privacy.quick_3_desc: You can update profile data, change password, and request deletion.
privacy.footer_note: For questions, contact us by email using the address below.
privacy.details_subtitle: Select a section to view more information.
privacy.section_data_desc: We collect only the data necessary to provide app functionality.
privacy.data_1: Account information: name, email, and provider identifiers (e.g., Facebook ID).
privacy.data_2: App content: trips, places, votes, and other items linked to your account.
privacy.data_3: Technical data: authentication tokens and basic logs needed for security and debugging.
privacy.section_use_desc: We use data to provide authentication and core features.
privacy.use_1: To authenticate users and protect access to accounts.
privacy.use_2: To enable trip planning features and store your content.
privacy.use_3: To improve reliability and security of the application.
privacy.no_sell: We do not sell personal data.
privacy.section_cookies_desc: We may use cookies or browser storage to keep you signed in and to support essential functionality.
privacy.cookies_1: Authentication tokens stored in browser storage for session handling.
privacy.cookies_2: Optional preferences such as language selection, where available.
privacy.section_rights_desc: You can access, update, and delete your data.
privacy.rights_1: Access and update your profile data in the app.
privacy.rights_2: Change your password and manage active sessions.
privacy.rights_3: Request data deletion or delete the account.
privacy.deletion_note: For data deletion, please see the Data Deletion Instructions page.
privacy.aside_1: This policy is provided to meet platform requirements and to inform users.
privacy.aside_2: The application is intended for educational use as a student project.
privacy.aside_3: We aim to minimize data collection and keep it limited to essential functionality.
